fields.description:
The same app is displaying the Action bar when Android version is 2.3.6 and not in 4.x versions.

This was again one simple update from 3.1.2 to Ti 3.3.0 resulting in a lot of unplannable and unwanted work. Appcelerator please pay attention to downward compatibility for developers that simply need to update their apps!!!!
fields.summary: Android: Action bar shown in Android 2.3.6 not in 4.x

comments.body:
Hello,
please read this blog post: http://www.appcelerator.com/blog/2014/08/hiding-the-android-actionbar/

Best Regards

Hello,

Yes please read that blog post and take my issue seriously instead of closing it with "not our bug".
You will notice that I already commented on that blog post.

I created a "no actionbar" theme, I had to remove the opacity=0 setting and then it worked on Android 4.x, but it is NOT working on Android 2.3.6.

Best regards,
